Segment.name: CMA
Segment.comment: Identifies the transaction set purpose and specifies the details of the cooperative agreement

Field.name: TransactionTypeCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the type of transaction

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Week
Field.comment: Week expressed as year/week (CCYYWW), where week is a number between 01 and 53 inclusive

Field.name: MarketAreaCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code qualifying the identifier represented in "Market Area Code Identifier (767)"

Field.name: MarketAreaCodeIdentifier
Field.comment: A unique identification of a market area

Field.name: CurrencyCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set
